verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Again, thou shalt <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H376>Whosoever<s%> <S%H376><s%> he be of the <S%H4480>children<s%> <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> or <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H1616>strangers<s%> that <S%H1481>sojourn<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H5414>giveth<s%> any of his <S%H4480>seed<s%> <S%H2233><s%> unto <S%H4432>Molech;<s%> he shall surely be put to <S%H4191>death:<s%> <S%H4191><s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> shall <S%H7275>stone<s%> him with <S%H68>stones.<s%>

And <S%H589>I<s%> will <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%> against <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> and will cut him <S%H3772>off<s%> <S%H853><s%> from <S%H4480>among<s%> <S%H7130><s%> his <S%H5971>people;<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> he hath <S%H5414>given<s%> of his <S%H4480>seed<s%> <S%H2233><s%> unto <S%H4432>Molech,<s%> <S%H4616>to<s%> <S%H2930>defile<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H4720>sanctuary,<s%> and to <S%H2490>profane<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name.<s%>

And <S%H518>if<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> do any ways <S%H5956>hide<s%> <S%H5956><s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H5869>eyes<s%> from the <S%H4480>man,<s%> <S%H376><s%> <S%H1931><s%> when he <S%H5414>giveth<s%> of his <S%H4480>seed<s%> <S%H2233><s%> unto <S%H4432>Molech,<s%> and <S%H4191>kill<s%> him not: <S%H1115><s%>

Then <S%H589>I<s%> will <S%H7760>set<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%> against <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> and against his <S%H4940>family,<s%> and will cut him <S%H3772>off,<s%> <S%H853><s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> that go a <S%H2181>whoring<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> him, to commit <S%H2181>whoredom<s%> <S%H310>with<s%> <S%H4432>Molech,<s%> from <S%H4480>among<s%> <S%H7130><s%> their <S%H5971>people.<s%>

And the <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H6437>turneth<s%> <S%H413>after<s%> such as have familiar <S%H178>spirits,<s%> and <S%H413>after<s%> <S%H3049>wizards,<s%> to go a <S%H2181>whoring<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> them, I will even <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%> against <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H5315>soul,<s%> and will cut him <S%H3772>off<s%> <S%H853><s%> from <S%H4480>among<s%> <S%H7130><s%> his <S%H5971>people.<s%>
Sanctify <S%H6942>yourselves<s%> therefore, and <S%H1961>be<s%> ye <S%H6918>holy:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>
And ye shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> them: <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> which <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> you.

For <S%H3588><s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H376><s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H7043>curseth<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> or his <S%H517>mother<s%> shall be surely put to <S%H4191>death:<s%> <S%H4191><s%> he hath <S%H7043>cursed<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> or his <S%H517>mother;<s%> his <S%H1818>blood<s%> shall be upon him.

And the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> committeth <S%H5003>adultery<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> another <S%H376>man's<s%> <S%H802>wife,<s%> even he <S%H834>that<s%> committeth <S%H5003>adultery<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor's<s%> <S%H802>wife,<s%> the <S%H5003>adulterer<s%> and the <S%H5003>adulteress<s%> shall surely be put to <S%H4191>death.<s%> <S%H4191><s%>

And the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H7901>lieth<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> his <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H802>wife<s%> hath <S%H1540>uncovered<s%> his <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H6172>nakedness:<s%> <S%H8147>both<s%> of them shall surely be put to <S%H4191>death;<s%> <S%H4191><s%> their <S%H1818>blood<s%> shall be upon them.

And <S%H834>if<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H7901>lie<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> his <S%H3618>daughter-in-law,<s%> <S%H8147>both<s%> of them shall surely be put to <S%H4191>death:<s%> <S%H4191><s%> they have <S%H6213>wrought<s%> <S%H8397>confusion;<s%> their <S%H1818>blood<s%> shall be upon them.

If <S%H834><s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> also <S%H7901>lie<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> <S%H2145>mankind,<s%> as he <S%H4904>lieth<s%> with a <S%H802>woman,<s%> <S%H8147>both<s%> of them have <S%H6213>committed<s%> an <S%H8441>abomination:<s%> they shall surely be put to <S%H4191>death;<s%> <S%H4191><s%> their <S%H1818>blood<s%> shall be upon them.

And <S%H834>if<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H853><s%> a <S%H802>wife<s%> and her <S%H517>mother,<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> is <S%H2154>wickedness:<s%> they shall be <S%H8313>burnt<s%> with <S%H784>fire,<s%> both he and they; that there <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H2154>wickedness<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> you.

And <S%H834>if<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H5414>lie<s%> <S%H7903><s%> with a <S%H929>beast,<s%> he shall surely be put to <S%H4191>death:<s%> <S%H4191><s%> and ye shall <S%H2026>slay<s%> the <S%H929>beast.<s%>

And <S%H834>if<s%> a <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H7126>approach<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H929>beast,<s%> and lie <S%H7250>down<s%> thereto, thou shalt <S%H2026>kill<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H802>woman,<s%> and the <S%H929>beast:<s%> they shall surely be put to <S%H4191>death;<s%> <S%H4191><s%> their <S%H1818>blood<s%> shall be upon them.

And <S%H834>if<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H269>sister,<s%> his <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> his <S%H517>mother's<s%> <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> and <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H853><s%> her <S%H6172>nakedness,<s%> and <S%H1931>she<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H6172>nakedness;<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> is a wicked <S%H2617>thing;<s%> and they shall be cut <S%H3772>off<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of their <S%H1121>people:<s%> <S%H5971><s%> he hath <S%H1540>uncovered<s%> his <S%H269>sister's<s%> <S%H6172>nakedness;<s%> he shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> his <S%H5771>iniquity.<s%>

And <S%H834>if<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> shall <S%H7901>lie<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> a <S%H802>woman<s%> having her <S%H1739>sickness,<s%> and shall <S%H1540>uncover<s%> <S%H853><s%> her <S%H6172>nakedness;<s%> he hath <S%H6168>discovered<s%> <S%H853><s%> her <S%H4726>fountain,<s%> and <S%H1931>she<s%> hath <S%H1540>uncovered<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4726>fountain<s%> of her <S%H1818>blood:<s%> and <S%H8147>both<s%> of them shall be cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from <S%H4480>among<s%> <S%H7130><s%> their <S%H5971>people.<s%>

And thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1540>uncover<s%> the <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> of thy <S%H517>mother's<s%> <S%H269>sister,<s%> nor of thy <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H269>sister:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> he <S%H6168>uncovereth<s%> <S%H853><s%> his near <S%H7607>kin:<s%> they shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> their <S%H5771>iniquity.<s%>

And <S%H834>if<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> shall <S%H7901>lie<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> his uncle's <S%H1733>wife,<s%> he hath <S%H1540>uncovered<s%> his <S%H1730>uncle's<s%> <S%H6172>nakedness:<s%> they shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> their <S%H2399>sin;<s%> they shall <S%H4191>die<s%> <S%H6185>childless.<s%>

And <S%H834>if<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H251>brother's<s%> <S%H802>wife,<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> is an unclean <S%H5079>thing:<s%> he hath <S%H1540>uncovered<s%> his <S%H251>brother's<s%> <S%H6172>nakedness;<s%> they shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H6185>childless.<s%>

Ye shall therefore <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H4941>judgments,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> them: that the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H834>whither<s%> <S%H8033><s%> <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H935>bring<s%> you to <S%H3427>dwell<s%> therein, spew you not <S%H6958>out.<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3808><s%>

And ye shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1980>walk<s%> in the <S%H2708>manners<s%> of the <S%H1471>nation,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> cast <S%H7971>out<s%> <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> you: <S%H3588>for<s%> they <S%H6213>committed<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> these <S%H428>things,<s%> and therefore I <S%H6973>abhorred<s%> them.

But I have <S%H559>said<s%> unto you, <S%H859>Ye<s%> shall <S%H3423>inherit<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H127>land,<s%> and <S%H589>I<s%> will <S%H5414>give<s%> it unto you to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it, a <S%H776>land<s%> that <S%H2100>floweth<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey:<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> have <S%H914>separated<s%> you <S%H4480>from<s%> other <S%H5971>people.<s%>

Ye shall therefore put <S%H914>difference<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H2889>clean<s%> <S%H929>beasts<s%> and <S%H2931>unclean,<s%> and <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H2931>unclean<s%> <S%H5775>fowls<s%> and <S%H2889>clean:<s%> and ye shall <S%H3808>not<s%> make your souls <S%H8262>abominable<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H5315><s%> by <S%H929>beast,<s%> or by <S%H5775>fowl,<s%> or by any <S%H3605>manner<s%> of living thing that <S%H7430>creepeth<s%> <S%H834><s%> on the <S%H127>ground,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H914>separated<s%> from you as <S%H2930>unclean.<s%>

And ye shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H6918>holy<s%> unto me: <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> am <S%H6918>holy,<s%> and have <S%H914>severed<s%> you <S%H4480>from<s%> other <S%H5971>people,<s%> that ye should <S%H1961>be<s%> mine.

A <S%H376>man<s%> also <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H1961>hath<s%> a familiar <S%H178>spirit,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> that is a <S%H3049>wizard,<s%> shall surely be put to <S%H4191>death:<s%> <S%H4191><s%> they shall <S%H7275>stone<s%> them with <S%H68>stones:<s%> their <S%H1818>blood<s%> shall be upon them.
